main.name: Natalia Haronitou
main.description: Business Graduate by Day, Aspiring Techie By Night
main.bio: My name is Natalia. I'm a Business Graduate currently exploring a newfound passion, technology. By doing so, I hope to gain the knowledge & capability to reposition myself within the tech-universe.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get to know me or anything else.

certifications.description: A credential offered by the Project Management Institute (PMI) to demonstrate knowledge in project management methodologies and best practices.
certifications.description1: Earners of Cisco CCNA - Implementing and Administering Cisco Solutions (CCNA) have demonstrated knowledge and skills related to network fundamentals, network access, IP connectivity, IP services, security fundamentals, and automation and programmability.
certifications.description2: Earners of the Azure AI Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and related Microsoft Azure services.Earners of the Azure AI Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and related Microsoft Azure services.
certifications.description3: Earning the Azure Administrator Associate certification validates the skills and knowledge to implement, manage, and monitor an organization’s Microsoft Azure environment. Candidates have a deep understanding of each implementing, managing, and monitoring identity, governance, storage, compute, and virtual networks in a cloud environment, plus provision, size, monitor, and adjust resources, when needed.
certifications.description4: Earners of this certification have a comprehensive understanding of AWS services and technologies. They demonstrated the ability to build secure and robust solutions using architectural design principles based on customer requirements. Badge owners are able to strategically design well-architected distributed systems that are scalable, resilient, efficient, and fault-tolerant.
certifications.description5: Linux Professional Institute Linux Essentials certificate demonstrates the candidate’s ability to use a basic command-line editor and demonstrate an understanding of processes, programs and components of the Linux operating system.
certifications.description6: Earner has a firm understanding of AI, its applications and use cases, and is familiar with IBM Watson AI services and APIs. They can create AI driven chatbots and have gained practical Python skills to work with AI. They can use IBM Watson AI services and APIs to design, build & deploy AI-powered applications on the web. They are proficient in applying AI and building AI solutions.
certifications.description7: Demonstrates proficiency in Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL). The earner understands various ML techniques such as regression, classification, clustering & recommender systems and is able to scale ML on Big Data using Apache Spark.  The earner is able to build, test & deploy DL models using libraries such as Keras, PyTorch & Tensorflow. The earner has completed several ML & DL projects and is now armed with skills for starting a career in AI Engineering.
certifications.cert8: Data Visualization with Tableau Specialization: University of California, Davis
certifications.description8: Offered by UC Davis in collaboration with Tableau: demonstrates knowledge of the fundamentals of data visualization, including how to use the Tableau software in a professional business setting.

testimonials.text: Natalia reminds you just how special comradery & laughter can be within a group... especially when getting through difficult projects.
